divs: Sighting DetailsThis is my third sighting of the night of the 2 I reported at earlier times. I observed a dim light going in one direction, from south to north. Very high, appeared to go at a fairly fast speed. Watched the object for about 2 minutes or so. There was really nothing extrordinary about the object. It may have been a satellite, but with the 2 other sightings I reported for the same night I wanted to report this one also.
trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Fountain
There were 2 other sightings in Fountain on or around April 20th 2012
Summary: DIM LIGHT GOING SOUTH TO NORTH
